explains: adj. [劳经]工作过度的；劳累过度的
v. [劳经]使工作过度；使过分劳累（overwork 的过去分词）

sentences.en: Being overworked or over-committed at home and on the job will not get you where you want to be in life.
sentences.cn: 无论是在家里还是工作上，过度劳累或过度投入都不会让你的生活达到你想要的状态。

sentences.en: The overworked, overextended parent may be seen as unloving, but may simply be exhausted.
sentences.cn: 那些工作超时超负荷的家长可能看起来没有爱心，但也可能仅仅是太累了。

sentences.en: "Ecological" has become one of the most overworked adjectives among manufacturers of garden supplies.
sentences.cn: “生态的”已成为园艺用品制造商最为滥用的形容词之一。
